page.title: 02Present Day Glapthorn
page.content: Glapthorn has no shops now apart from the pub but that is not really a shop but there is a Garden Centre. The Bakers house has gone and the Wheelwrights has gone. Glapthorn School is much bigger now. The Chapel that we talked about in Old Glapthorn has gone. There was a Chapel but that went in the war. Now the drains are much better. There was no electricity before the war but there is now. The washing facilities are better now. School times are different. There have been about twenty houses built and most houses have been been modernised.
